official_title: A bill to amend the Antihijacking Act of 1974 to extend the protections afforded by that Act to common carriers of passengers for hire.

summary.text: Amends the Antihijacking Act of 1974 to extend to all common carriers of passengers for hire the protection of the criminal penalties imposed by such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Antihijacking Act of 1974 to extend the protections afforded by that Act to common carriers of passengers for hire.
